Module kivakit.filesystems.java
Package com.telenav.kivakit.filesystem.java

Class JavaFileSystemService

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.filesystem.java.JavaFileSystemService
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.telenav.kivakit.component.Component, com.telenav.kivakit.component.ComponentMixin, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Broadcaster, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Listener, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.MessageTransceiver, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Repeater, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.repeaters.RepeaterMixin, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Transceiver, com.telenav.kivakit.core.registry.RegistryTrait, com.telenav.kivakit.filesystem.spi.FileSystemService, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.messaging.Receiver, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.messaging.Transmitter, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.Nameable, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.NamedObject, com.telenav.kivakit.mixins.Mixin
public class JavaFileSystemService extends Object implements com.telenav.kivakit.filesystem.spi.FileSystemService, com.telenav.kivakit.component.ComponentMixin
Not public API

Implementation of the FileSystemService SPI to provide java.nio filesystem access through the KIVAKIT resource API. This service accepts FilePaths that supported by default local filesystem and it provides implementations of FileService and FolderService which are used by File and Folder to provide transparent access to file system

Author:
yinyinz
